content: In YAML format, present five essential oils along with their primary beneficial properties and common uses.

Sure! Here are five essential oils presented in YAML format, including their primary beneficial properties and common uses:

```yaml
- name: Lavender
  properties:
    - Calming
    - Relaxing
    - Soothing
  uses:
    - Stress relief
    - Improved sleep quality
    - Skin care

- name: Peppermint
  properties:
    - Energizing
    - Refreshing
    - Cooling
  uses:
    - Mental clarity
    - Digestive support
    - Muscle soreness relief

- name: Tea Tree
  properties:
    - Antimicrobial
    - Antibacterial
    - Anti-inflammatory
  uses:
    - Skin disinfection
    - Respiratory support
    - Hair care

- name: Eucalyptus
  properties:
    - Decongestant
    - Invigorating
    - Purifying
  uses:
    - Respiratory issues
    - Aches and pains
    - Air purification

- name: Lemon
  properties:
    - Uplifting
    - Cleansing
    - Immune-boosting
  uses:
    - Mood enhancement
    - Household cleaning
    - Digestive health
```

I hope this helps! Let me know if you need more information on any of these essential oils or if there's something else I can assist you with.
